message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI

The paper discusses a method for patent analytics using feature vector space model (FVSM) constructed by mapping patent documents to feature vectors extracted by convolutional neural networks (CNN). This method is proposed to address the limitations of the vector space model (VSM) method, which is originally proposed for information retrieval systems but suffers from several limitations when applied to patent analysis tasks. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV), and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories of arXiv CS.
